title: On some semi-parametric estimates for European option prices. (arXiv:2306.10929v1 [math.PR])
abstract: We show that an estimate by de la Pe\~na, Ibragimov and Jordan for $\mathbb{E}(X-c)^+$, with $c$ a constant and $X$ a random variable of which the mean, the variance, and $\mathbb{P}(X \leq c)$ are known, implies an estimate by Scarf on the infimum of $\mathbb{E}(X \wedge c)$ over the set of positive random variables $X$ with fixed mean and variance. This also shows, as a consequence, that the former estimate implies an estimate by Lo on European option prices.

translated_title: 关于欧式期权价格的半参数估计
translated_abstract: 本文证明了de la Peña, Ibragimov和Jordan的一个估计方法，可以用来估计$\mathbb{E}(X-c)^+$，其中$c$为常数，$X$为随机变量，其均值、方差和$\mathbb{P}(X \leq c)$都已知。这意味着Scarf的估计方法可以被用来估计所有正随机变量$X$的$\mathbb{E}(X \wedge c)$下确界，且这两种估计方法可以用来估计欧式期权价格的Lo的估计方法。
tldr: 本文提出了一种半参数估计方法，可以用来估计欧式期权价格，同时也保证了对于正随机变量$X$的$\mathbb{E}(X \wedge c)$下确界的估计。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a semi-parametric estimation method for European option prices and shows that it also implies an estimation method for the infimum of $\mathbb{E}(X \wedge c)$ over positive random variables $X$ with fixed mean and variance, which can be used to estimate European option prices as well.
